misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The use of the cryptographic algorithm "IDEA" is considered broken and should be avoided. It has been shown to be vulnerable to attacks and should not be used for any security-related purposes.
recommendation: Replace the use of the "IDEA" algorithm with a more secure and up-to-date algorithm, such as AES or ChaCha20.
